scripts.dev:desktop: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev -w @premium-password-manager/app" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run dev -w @premium-password-manager/electron"
scripts.build:desktop: npm run build && mkdir -p packages/electron/app-dist && cp -r packages/app/dist/* packages/electron/app-dist/ && npm run package -w @premium-password-manager/electron
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:app && npm run build:electron
